duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the Contract and Pricing department, improve data distribution, and ensure compliance with Audit and SOX requirements.
Assist with the management, implementation, and scheduling of various products from HFC refineries.
Provide support for marketing reports, pricing databases, and process improvements within the department.
Resolve conflicts for employees and customers and ensure positive working relationships within all other departments.
Process department AFE for capital projects and perform monthly financial reports and analyses for the department.
Supervise, direct, train, and motivate contract and pricing staff and oversee office administration.
Communicate with personnel, other departments, and customers regarding contracts and pricing and serve as a department representative on system development initiatives.
Perform special assignments or tasks assigned by superiors.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business or a related field, or equivalent work experience. Master’s degree preferred.
